meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt McQueary John McLean Anthony Fox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6065.

td.p: Matt McQueary, a governmental auditor from Cold Spring, Kentucky
John McLean, a software consultant from Pasadena, California
Anthony Fox, an account executive from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,800)

tr.td: DROP DEAD DIVA
THE BIG "C"
JUS-TIFIED
(Alex: Remember jus is Latin for "law" or "right".)
RESCUE ME
MY BOYS
THEY'RE ON CABLE TV

AnthonyWho are Jefferson & Jackson
$1,000
JohnWho are Jefferson and Carter?
$2,501
MattWho are J. Adams + Jefferson
$9,001
George Washington & Thomas Jefferson')
